name: FOS - Download File(s)
description:
Download of database-stored BLOBs and CLOBs. Multiple files are zipped automatically.

Free Plug-in under MIT License

All FOS plug-ins are released under MIT License, which essentially means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if commercial or private use.

Overview

Use the FOS - Download File(s) plug-in to start the browser download of files stored in the database. The files can be compiled via a SQL query or procedurally in a PL/SQL code block. If multiple files are returned, they will be zipped automatically. A single file can optionally be zipped as well. The files can be BLOBs or CLOBs.

This plug-in must be instantiated as a Before Header process. If the server-side condition passes, the download will commence and the page will not continue to load.
